pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, April 10, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

Media appearance

9:00 a.m. A joint interview with the Prime Minister, the President of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen, and Global Citizen CEO, Hugh Evans, will air on CNN’s State of the Union with Jake Tapper and Dana Bash.
